definition: to take off costume and makeup/bottom garment (trousers etc)
down/downwards/below/lower/later/next (week etc)/second (of two parts)/to decline/to go down/to arrive at (a decision, conclusion etc)/measure word to show the frequency of an action
adornment/to adorn/dress/clothing/costume (of an actor in a play)/to play a role/to pretend/to install/to fix/to wrap (sth in a bag)/to load/to pack

sentences.english: Use of this Website by potential proposers is strongly encouraged.
sentences.chinese: 使用本網站的潛在提案下裝。

sentences.english: The lengths of the skirts saw different levels, from the knee to the ankle.
sentences.chinese: 下裝的長度也有了不同的差別，從及膝到及踝不等。

sentences.english: Lately I've been fond of high waists.
sentences.chinese: 最近我開始喜歡高腰圍的下裝。

sentences.english: So the roll-up sleeve and tucking in is a must.
sentences.chinese: 穿的時候捲起袖子和塞進下裝是必須的嘍。

sentences.english: Our camera could be loaded in daylight.
sentences.chinese: 我們的相機可以在日光下裝膠捲。

definition: crew neck/round neck (of pull-over garment, e.g. T-shirt)
